content: a crochet version of the popular fringed macrame coasters the boho bobble coasters are round textured coasters with bohemian flair the pattern utilizes bobble stitches and fringe for a fun cotton coaster finished coasters measure 5 inches across without fringe and 6 inches across with fringe these coasters work up quickly and use only about 30 yards of yarn they re perfect for busting your cotton yarn stash to crochet your coasters you ll need ~30 yards of worsted weight cotton yarn i used sugar n cream in blueberry a g 4 5 mm crochet hook a tapestry needle and a small comb for brushing out the fringe if you make the boho bobble coasters please share them with me on instagram using #bohobobblecoasters and #youshouldcraft disclaimer you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
